description:
Learn How To Start A Podcast

If you're interested in getting in front of thousands of targeted visitors for FREE, podcasting is an awesome option.

In this course, you'll learn:

  • How to create a podcast topic that people would love to hear about...
  • How to line up AMAZING guests even if you're brand new...
  • Get your podcast uploaded, easily...
  • How to get in front of thousands of people
  • How to get onto featured in New & Noteworthy and get in front of thousands of people
  • ...and a lot more. This course is super-thorough and full of everything you need to start a podcast.
title: Podcasting: How To Get 1500 - 4000 Downloads Per Episode
